prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Pavol regularly gives lectures at conferences, sits on juries, and acts as a mentor in many Czech and international competitions. He has a special heart for this and loves open source, with many of his projects available on his GitHub.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Title should be concise and clear
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
